# 32-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 32-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_uint1**: A vector of one 32-bit unsigned integer element.
- **simd_uint2**: A vector of two 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uint3**: A vector of three 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uint4**: A vector of four 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uint8**: A vector of eight 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uint16**: A vector of sixteen 32-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_uint2**: A packed vector of two 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uint4**: A packed vector of four 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uint8**: A packed vector of eight 32-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uint16**: A packed vector of sixteen 32-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Unsigned Integer Vectors

- **8-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 8-bit integer elements.
- **16-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 16-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 64-bit integer elements.
